details.description:
Join us for locally roasted coffee, cold brew, a full range of expert espresso beverages, and seasonal drinks! Coming soon, we will start serving fresh pastries, unique bagel creations, original cocktails, beer, and wine.
Our coffee is roasted locally in Rock Hill, SC, and beans are available onsite or via our website for retail purchase. Visit our website for more information. Better yet, drop by to see us in person!

raw_data.name: Knowledge Perk Coffee Company
raw_data.description:
Join us for locally roasted coffee, cold brew, a full range of expert espresso beverages, and seasonal drinks! Coming soon, we will start serving fresh pastries, unique bagel creations, original cocktails, beer, and wine.
Our coffee is roasted locally in Rock Hill, SC, and beans are available onsite or via our website for retail purchase. Visit our website for more information. Better yet, drop by to see us in person!

reviews_data.review_text: Knowledge perk has the best coffee in Charlotte, and I have tried quite a few. Recommend the honey badger or the salted caramel latte!

I just visited for the first time on a friend’s recommendation and tried the Salted Toffee Crunch Latte. It was absolutely delicious! Michael was incredibly kind and welcoming. This place is definitely going to be my new go to for coffee!

The coffee is fantastic. This is my favorite coffee shop in the Charlotte area as I used to go to the Fort Mill location always and have never had a problem.

I want to happily give 5 stars, but the issue with the Uptown Location is that out of the 3 times we went as a group for a mid-day coffee break, twice they were closed when everything said they were open until 5, and we went around 2:00 PM one day and 1:00 PM another.

Again, great coffee and was so ecstatic that I could walk 15 minutes  one way from work to this location during the week, but 2/3 times we have, it wasn't open when it should have been and we just wasted 30 minutes of walking roundtrip for nothing.
Great coffee and dessert options. And it’s right there close to my office! Love it😍
Great coffee and friendly staff
Personable service. Variety of coffees & Flavors. Aubrey was so nice and friendly. Spinach & Feta crossaint was so light and filling.
Aubrey (sp?) recommended a white chocolate macadamia iced latte this morning, and it’s been the best part of my week. Excellent service and coffee!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for your kind words!

reviews_data.review_text: Fantastic location for some quality coffee , enjoy getting my daily fix with Aubree and the team
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for your review! We strive to provide great locally roasted coffee and look forward to continuing to serve you!

reviews_data.review_text: Great experience was not a big coffee guy but knowledge perk made me love it !
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for your review! We hope to add pastries, martinis and such more and would love for you to try them as well!

reviews_data.review_text: Great coffee, great location, reasonable prices. a welcome additional to latta arcade.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for your kind words! We are excited to serve our community at and around latta arcade!

reviews_data.review_text:
Easy and great customizability (non-dairy milk, sweetness level). Excited for this to be here!

No seats inside but they have a little standing counter and plenty both in and outside the Latte Arcade like most other businesses in this area.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for the great review, Amanda! We hope to see you back again soon!

raw_data.name: Knowledge Perk Coffee Company
raw_data.full_address: 320 S Tryon St #116, Charlotte, NC 28202, United States
